name: Allen Tran
body:
I'm currently a data scientist at [Premise](http://www.premise.com).

Check out the [Premise Blog](http://blog.premise.com) to see what I've been up to at work.  I also have an interest in applying tools from Data Science (graph/network analysis and convolutional nets) to Econ.    

Of course, you can also find my research from my past life as an Econ PhD at UCLA.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
